alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Chickasaw (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 2:24PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Chickasaw and southeastern Calhoun Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 224 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Derma, or 16 miles west of Houston, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Houston, Okolona, Bruce, Calhoun City, Vardaman, Derma, Pittsboro, Pyland, Trebloc, Houlka, New Houlka, Woodland, Sparta, Thorn, Van Vleet, Parkersburg, Reid, Loyd, Thelma and Tabbville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
